levels.description: Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, and grants effects of Talent 2 to all Operators on the field; creates a wall of fire spanning the entire field: Arts damage dealt by other allies that crosses the wall will deal an additional <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of Yu's ATK as <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</>; enemy projectiles passing through the wall have a <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance of being removed
